name: SnekStompa-3D
description:
PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA STAGE!
MANY FEATURES ARE MISSING, PLEASE READ OUR ROADMAP FOR MORE INFORMATION!

Play as Chad who is mega based to cleans his homeworld from the Snek plague his brother brought upon. Stomp your way up the highscore ladder and show the world your place! (Not yet implemented)

ROADMAP

  • Settings Menu
  • Pause Menu in Game
  • Better GUI
  • Online Highscore
  • Couch Coop/Battle
  • Better Music and Sound-Effects
  • Stomp Attack (+ more Animations)
  • Performance optimization
  • Mac compatibility

More or less in this order...

KNOWN BUGS

You can get stuck in the Chain while jumping through it.
-> If you are in Fullscreen-Mode: Alt+F4,
     else just close the Window and restart the Game

SNEK STOMPA will keep you glued to your screen longer than the latest social media hype. You are king of the castle in this ultimately challenging snek-plonking simulation. Jump and stomp your way to the highscore as you try to rid your castle from hoards of angry sneks coming right at you (where DO they come from, I wonder). There's sneks in this m*****f******g castle!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             --MOLUS

CONTROLS

Movement - WASD or Arrow-Keys Jump - Space You can fall through certain Level-Elements by pushing Down

Controllers are supported in this game!
